name: Devito
description: '''David Ljubenović''' ({{Langx|sr|Давид Љубеновић}}, born 9 May 1995), professionally known as '''Devito''', is a [[Serbs|Serbian]] rapper. Originally working as a photographer and music video director, he made his official recording debut in 2018. Devito is recognised for wearing a white three-hole [[Balaclava (clothing)|balaclava]] in public to hide his true identity. Following numerous standalone singles, he released his debut studio album, ''[[Plava krv]]'', in May 2023, which achieved commercial success.
